mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_HOSPITAL WHERE HOSP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{hospNm}, '%')
SELECT * FROM TB_FARM WHERE FARM_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{farmNm}, '%')

SELECT A.* , (SELECT FILE_NEW_NM FROM TB_FILE WHERE HOSP_NO = A.HOSP_NO AND FILE_GB = 'F001-01') AS hospRnFilePathName , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_NO = A.HOSP_FIRST_DOCTOR) AS hospFirstDoctorNm FROM TB_HOSPITAL A WHERE 1=1
AND A.HOSP_NO = #{hospNo}

SELECT * , (SELECT FILE_NEW_NM FROM TB_FILE WHERE FARM_NO = A.FARM_NO AND FILE_GB = 'F001-01') AS farmRnFilePathName FROM TB_FARM A WHERE 1=1
AND A.FARM_NO = #{farmNo}

SELECT 'hospital' AS GUBUN , HOSP_NM , HOSP_TEL , HOSP_HP , HOSP_EMAIL , HOSP_FAX , HOSP_ADR , HOSP_ZIP , HOSP_CEO , HOSP_RN , HOSP_SIDO_NM , HOSP_SIGUNGU_NM , HOSP_ACCOUNT_NO , HOSP_BANK_NM , HOSP_NO FROM TB_HOSPITAL WHERE 1=1
AND HOSP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{popSearchNm}, '%')
UNION ALL SELECT 'farm' AS GUBUN , FARM_NM , FARM_TEL , FARM_HP , FARM_EMAIL , FARM_FAX , FARM_ADR , FARM_ZIP , FARM_CEO , FARM_RN , FARM_SIDO_NM , FARM_SIGUNGU_NM , FARM_ACCOUNT_NO , FARM_BANK_NM , FARM_NO FROM TB_FARM WHERE 1=1
AND FARM_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{popSearchNm}, '%')
SELECT USER_NO , USER_NM FROM TB_USER WHERE 1=1 AND HOSP_NO = #{hospNo} AND USER_LEV IN ('2', '3', '5')

SELECT * FROM TB_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND UPP_CODE_ID = #{codeId}
AND CODE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{codeId},'%')
AND CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{codeNm},'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MENU SET LEV_ONE = IFNULL(#{levOne}, LEV_ONE) , LEV_TWO = IFNULL(#{levTwo}, LEV_TWO) , LEV_THREE = IFNULL(#{levThree}, LEV_THREE) , LEV_FOUR = IFNULL(#{levFour}, LEV_FOUR) WHERE MENU_NO = #{menuNo}
